lenders.name: Tord
lenders.loan_because:
I found this site a couple of years ago, and didn't think about it so much. It was hard to find a person/group to lend the money to. But after seeing a clip about Kiva on BBC, I wanted to give it another try. I will first try a small loan and then go up. But because I don't make any money myself I wont give any big loans yet.

UPDATE 19.09.2010 :
My first loan was a success.
But, I need the money myself now.
And I will be back when I get myself a place to work. My loans then will be bigger than the minimum 25 USD.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with children with special needs. I am part of the education team that helps these children attain as much functionality and independence as they are capable of. Some of my children are physically handicapped, others are mentally handicapped, and others are both. Many students I have worked with have behavior problems and are just learning to communicate. I'm currently working on a college degree and I want to be a math teacher when I'm finished.
